outcome:
ORDER OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS
MAGISTRATE COURT KOTHAMANGALAM DATED 30.9.2011 ACQUITTING THE ACCUSED
RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS: NIL
TRUE COPY
PA TO JUDGE
SCL.

2014/KER/214
HARUN-UL-RASHID, J.
Dated this the 2” day of January, 2014
ORDER

Petitioner is the fifth accused in Crime No.186 of 2001 of
Kothamangalam Police Station, now pending as C.C.No.517 of
2011 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court,
Kothamangalam. The offences alleged are punishable under
Sections 143, 147, 148, 323, 324 and 326 r/w Section 149 of
the Indian Penal Code. The Crl. M.C. is filed seeking to quash
all further proceedings against the petitioner in C.C.No.517 of
2011 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court,
Kothamangalam.

2. There are altogether 5 accused. The accused Nos. 1
to 4 faced trial and as per the order in C.C.No.246 of 2008 on
the same court, they were acquitted under Section 248(1) of
the Code of Criminal Procedure. The learned Magistrate on
evidence held that, identity of the accused persons was not
established that, the available materials will not suggest anything

aah
ape
2014/KER/214
Crl.M.C.No. 29 of 2014
2
to show that the accused Nos. 1 to 4 attacked CWs 1 to 5 and
caused hurt and grievous hurt to them. The dispute between the
accused and the injured had been settled and presently the
injured got no complaint against these accused.
In the facts and circumstances, no purpose will be served
by prosecuting the petitioner. Hence, the Crl.M.C is allowed. All
further proceedings in C.C.No.517 of 2011 of the Judicial First
Class Magistrate Court, Kothamangalam is quashed

THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID
THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935
Cr1.MC.No. 29 of 2014 ()
(CRIME NO. 186/2001 OF KOTHAMANGALAM POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM
DISTRICT)
PETITIONER/5TH ACCUSED:
SEBIN, AGED 34 YEARS
S/O.JOSEPH, PANNIPPALLIL HOUSE, VECHOOCHIRA BHAGAM
KUNNUMKARA, KOLLAMULA VILLAGE, RANNI.
BY ADVS.SRI.P.M.HABEEB
SMT.FRINDA PAILY
RESPONDENT :
STATE OF KERALA

KOTHAMANGALAM) .
R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. SAREENA GEORGE
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Petitioner is the fifth accused in Crime No.186 of 2001 of
Kothamangalam Police Station, now pending as C.C.No.517 of
2011 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court,
Kothamangalam. The offences alleged are punishable under

the Indian Penal Code. The Crl. M.C. is filed seeking to quash
all further proceedings against the petitioner in C.C.No.517 of
2011 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court,

2. There are altogether 5 accused. The accused Nos. 1
to 4 faced trial and as per the order in C.C.No.246 of 2008 on
the same court, they were acquitted under Section 248(1) of
the Code of Criminal Procedure. The learned Magistrate on
evidence held that, identity of the accused persons was not
established that, the available materials will not suggest anything
